Prague.name: Old Town
Prague.description: Staré Město with Astronomical Clock, Týn Church, and Old Town Square

Prague.name: Malá Strana
Prague.description: Lesser Town with Baroque palaces, St. Nicholas Church, and Nerudova Street

Prague.name: Josefov
Prague.description: Jewish Quarter with Old-New Synagogue, cemetery, and Kafka's heritage

Prague.name: Žižkov
Prague.description: Working-class district with TV Tower, pubs, and independent spirit

Prague.name: Vinohrady
Prague.description: Elegant residential area with Art Nouveau villas, cafes, and parks

Prague.name: Karlín
Prague.description: Revitalized district with trendy restaurants, breweries, and Karlín Music Theater

Prague.name: Holešovice
Prague.description: Industrial-chic with DOX gallery, Výstaviště fairgrounds, and creative spaces

Prague.name: Hradčany
Prague.description: Castle District with Prague Castle, Golden Lane, and cathedral views

Prague.name: Nové Město
Prague.description: New Town with Wenceslas Square, shopping, and business district

Prague.name: Kampa
Prague.description: Island park with Lennon Wall, modern art museum, and riverside cafes
